attributes.action: Dissolve parliament and call a general election so that we can elect a new parliament untainted by the scandal of MP's expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current parliament is fatally damaged by the scandal of MPs expenses, the only way that credibility can be restored is through the election of a new parliament. 
Changing the expense rules is necessary but by itself is not enough. Each MP needs to place their record in front of their voters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
